Method.name: InternalSerializeObject
Method.Implementation: set metadata = ##class(ProtoBufMetadataProvider).%New(object.%ClassName(1)) set iterator = object.GetStaticIterator() while(iterator.GetNext(.prop)){ set tag = metadata.PropToTag(prop) set propVal = $property(object, prop) set type = $s($number(propVal)'="": 0, 1: 2) }

Method.name: InternalSerializeDataType
InternalSerializeString
Method.Implementation: //Utf8 set utfi = $ZCONVERT(object,"O","UTF8") set len = $length(utfi) do ..InternalSerializeVarInt(len, stream) $$$do(stream.Write(utfi))

Method.name: InternalSerializeVarInt
InternalSerializeZigZag
Method.Implementation: set a = object set a = a * 2 if (a<0){ set a = a - 1 } do ..InternalSerializeVarInt(a, stream)
